short_desc: FRMDATEB9F must not be from date before form was released
full_desc: Q0a. FRMDATEB9F (B9F form date) must not be from date before form was released (2012)

test_name: FTDCPPA aligns with Form D1a PPASYN
full_desc: If Form D1a Q8d. PPASYN (Primary progressive aphasia symdrome) = 1 (present) then Q12. FTDCPPA (Root diagnosis of PPA) should = 1 (Yes - meets root diagnosis of PPA)

test_name: FTDCPPA aligns with Form D1a PPASYN
short_desc: If PPASYN ne 1 then FTDCPPA should = 0 or blank
full_desc: If Form D1a Q8d. PPASYN (Primary progressive aphasia symdrome) does not = 1 (present) then Q12. FTDCPPA (Root diagnosis of PPA) should = 0 (No) or blank

test_name: FTDCPPAS aligns with Form D1a PPASYNT
full_desc: If Form D1a Q8d1. PPASYNT (Primary progressive aphasia symdrome - type) = 1 (semantic PPA) then Q13. FTDCPPAS (Consensus diagnosis of dominant PPA subtype) should = 1 (PPA, semantic variant)

test_name: FTDCPPAS aligns with Form D1a PPASYNT
full_desc: If Form D1a Q8d1. PPASYNT (Primary progressive aphasia symdrome - type) = 2 (logopenic PPA) then Q13. FTDCPPAS (Consensus diagnosis of dominant PPA subtype) should = 3 (PPA, logopenic variant)

test_name: FTDCPPAS aligns with Form D1a PPASYNT
full_desc: If Form D1a Q8d1. PPASYNT (Primary progressive aphasia symdrome - type) = 3 (nonfluent/agrammatic PPA) then Q13. FTDCPPAS (Consensus diagnosis of dominant PPA subtype) should = 2 (PPA, nonfluent/agrammatic variant)

test_name: FTDCPPAS aligns with Form D1a PPASYNT
full_desc: If Form D1a Q8d1. PPASYNT (Primary progressive aphasia symdrome - type) = 5 (PPA other/not otherwise specified) then Q13. FTDCPPAS (Consensus diagnosis of dominant PPA subtype) should = 4 (PPA, not otherwise specified)

test_name: FTDBVFT aligns with Form D1a FTDSYN
short_desc: If FTDSYN = 1 then FTDBVFT should not = 0 or blank
full_desc: If Form D1a Q8e. FTDSYN (Behavioral variant frontotemporal syndrome) = 1 (present) then Q22. FTDBVFT (Subject meet the criteria for clinical probable or possible byFTD syndrome) should not = 0 (Does not meet criteria for bvFTD) or blank
test_logic: If FTDSYN = 1 and FTDBVFT = 0 or blank

test_name: FTDBVFT aligns with Form D1a FTDSYN
short_desc: If FTDSYN ne 1 then FTDBVFT should = 0 or blank
full_desc: If Form D1a Q8e. FTDSYN (Behavioral variant frontotemporal syndrome) does not = 1 (present) then Q22. FTDBVFT (Subject meet the criteria for clinical probable or possible bvFTD syndrome) should = 0 (Does not meet criteria for bvFTD) or blank
test_logic: If FTDSYN ne 1 and FTDBVFT ne 0 or blank

short_desc: If FTDEMGMN[prev_vis]=1 and FTDEMGPV=1, then FTDEMGMN should equal 1
full_desc: If Q25. FTDEMGMN (evidence of motor neuron disease on EMG)=1 (Yes) at the previous visit and Q23. FTDEMGPV(Was an electromyogram (EMG) performed at this visit?)=1 (Yes), then Q25. FTDEMGMN (evidence of motor neuron disease on EMG) should equal 1 (Yes)
test_logic: If FTDEMGMN[prev_vis]=1 and FTDEMGPV=1 and FTDEMGMN ne 1

test_name: At least one of the following variables must = 2:  FTDPPAPO, FTDPPAIW, FTDPPASW, FTDPPAPK, FTDPPAGS, FTDPPAEH, FTDPPACS, FTDPPASS, FTDPPASR, FTDPPASD
short_desc: If FTDPPASL=1, at least one etiology must be assessed: FTDPPAPO, FTDPPAIW, FTDPPASW, FTDPPAPK, FTDPPAGS, FTDPPAEH, FTDPPACS, FTDPPASS, FTDPPASR, FTDPPASD
full_desc: If Q1. FTDPPASL (PPA: Is acquired disorder of language a prominent element in presentation?) =1, at least one of the following questions should be 2 (definitely present): Q2. FTDPPAPO, Q3. FTDPPAIW, Q4. FTDPPASW, Q5. FTDPPAPK, Q6. FTDPPAGS, Q7. FTDPPAEH, Q8. FTDPPACS, Q9. FTDPPASS, Q10. FTDPPASR, Q11. FTDPPASD
test_logic: If FTDPPASL =1 and none of (FTDPPAPO, FTDPPAIW, FTDPPASW, FTDPPAPK, FTDPPAGS, FTDPPAEH, FTDPPACS, FTDPPASS, FTDPPASR, FTDPPASD) =2
comp_vars: FTDPPASL, FTDPPAPO, FTDPPAIW, FTDPPASW, FTDPPAPK, FTDPPAGS, FTDPPAEH, FTDPPACS, FTDPPASS, FTDPPASR, FTDPPASD

test_name: At least one of the following variables must = 2:  FTDBVDIS,  FTDBVAPA, FTDBVLOS, FTDBVRIT, FTDBVHYP, FTDBVNEU, FTDBVIDL
short_desc: If FTDBVCLN=1, at least one etiology must be assessed: FTDBVDIS, FTDBVAPA, FTDBVLOS, FTDBVRIT, FTDBVHYP, FTDBVNEU, FTDBVIDL
full_desc: If Q14. FTDBVCLN (bvFTD: Are acquired alterations in behavior, personality, or comportment important elements in the clinical presentation of the subject?) =1, at least one of the following questions should be 2 (definitely present): Q15. FTDBVDIS, Q16. FTDBVAPA, Q17. FTDBVLOS, Q18. FTDBVRIT, Q19. FTDBVHYP, Q20. FTDBVNEU, Q21. FTDBVIDL
test_logic: If FTDBVCLN=1 and none of (FTDBVDIS, FTDBVAPA, FTDBVLOS, FTDBVRIT, FTDBVHYP, FTDBVNEU, FTDBVIDL) =2
comp_vars: FTDBVCLN, FTDBVDIS, FTDBVAPA, FTDBVLOS, FTDBVRIT, FTDBVHYP, FTDBVNEU, FTDBVIDL
